{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17513v1", "title": "Uncountably many $2$-spherical groups of Kac-Moody type of rank $3$ over
  $\mathbb{F}_2$", "summary": "In this paper we show that Weyl-invariant commutator blueprints of type $(4,
4, 4)$ are faithful. As a consequence we answer a question of Tits from the
late $1980$s about twin buildings. Moreover, we obtain the first example of a
$2$-spherical Kac-Moody group over a finite field which is not finitely
presented.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-24T12:56:44Z"}
